wikipedia_page.main: Martyn Sprague (born 10 April 1949) is a Welsh former professional footballer. A left-back, he joined Newport County in 1969 from local club Lovells Athletic. He went on to make 156 English Football League appearances for Newport scoring one goal. In 1974, he joined Merthyr Tydfil.
